meanings.sent1: I will retint the walls to make them a darker shade.
meanings.sent2: She decided to retint her hair to cover the gray strands.
meanings.sent3: After the paint dried unevenly, they had to retint the entire room.
meanings.sent4: The artist had to retint the sky in the painting to achieve the desired effect.
meanings.sent5: He carefully retinted the photo to restore its original colors.

meanings.sent1: The retint of the car's windows made them darker.
meanings.sent2: She requested a retint of her hair to fix the fading color.
meanings.sent3: The retint of the fabric gave it a richer hue.
meanings.sent4: The retint of the painting brought out new details.
meanings.sent5: The retint of the glasses made them look brand new.
